channel.title: The Bottom of the Page Podcast
channel.description: Here on the Bottom of the Page podcast, we explore the lives, ambitions and aspirations of individuals who livestream or otherwise contribute to platforms such as Twitch or YouTube despite their lack of viewership. We want to find out what makes them tick, and why they do what they do. Are they in it for the money? Community? Do they even know? We're here to find out!
channel.itunes:author: Doctor McBoop and Prophet Zopu
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about content creators at the bottom of the page
channel.itunes:summary: Here on the Bottom of the Page podcast, we explore the lives, ambitions and aspirations of individuals who livestream or otherwise contribute to platforms such as Twitch or YouTube despite their lack of viewership. We want to find out what makes them tick, and why they do what they do. Are they in it for the money? Community? Do they even know? We're here to find out!

item.title: Bottom of the Page Episode 1
item.description: Bottom of the Page "streamers" discuss livestreaming anxiety, background music, webcams, and the future of The Bottom of the Page podcast.
